name: Vertex Ray
description:
Vertex Ray is a company dedicated to develop and design User Experience projects. Under the mantra "Creating Experience"​, we develope innovative designs with advanced technology, easy to integrate, flexible and with great advantages and possibilities. 
We are passionate technologists with more than 10 years of experience in complex web and mobile projects for different type of industries. This makes us the ideal team for your development project.
 
+ 300.000 Hs Frontend Development
+ 1M Users Interact with our developed interfaces
+ 25 UX Specialists working in four countries
What we do:
We develop our products based on the best usability practices and on Microsoft’s leading technologies.
Vertex Ray was founded in 2007, since then, we have had more than 10 years’ experience on UX with the Microsoft platform, attaining the following competency: Microsoft Silver Web Development.
Quality is present every time we commit to new projects and it motivates our continued improvement of their development, using cutting-edge technologies that show excellent results for our customers on quality control checks.
Our Services: 
•    UX Consulting and Development (User experience)
•    Azure Consulting (Cloud computing)
•    Mobile Development
•    Web Development
•    Outsourcing
 
How we do it:
UX design is the process of solving a problem for the user, helping them achieve their goals with ease and, thus, provide them with a pleasant experience. 
We have 6 steps process
1 . Investigate
2. Ideate
3. Prototype
4. Evaluate
5. Produce
6. Testing
